attributes.action: increase the jail sentence of Jack Tweed to a more reasonable level befitting his crime.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jack Tweed attacked a 16 year old boy with a golf club. While on bail for this charge, he continued to break the law and attacked a taxi driver. His curfew was lifted so that he could marry Big Brother "Celebrity" Jade Goody which was already something that no other criminal in this country gets a chance of. To then lower his custodial sentence due to "personal circumstances" is taking abuse of Mr Tweed's public status too far.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
